node.title: At Least 8 Dead at Houston Music Festival After Crowd Surge Causes ‘Panic’
node.alt: The Astroworld music festival in Houston on Friday, hours before the Travis Scott concert.
node.description: Dozens of other people who attended a Travis Scott concert at the Astroworld music festival were injured, Houston’s fire chief said.
node.content: ["At least eight people were killed and dozens more were injured at a music festival in Houston on Friday night after a large crowd \u201cbegan to compress towards the front of the stage,\u201d the city\u2019s fire chief said at a news conference.", "The crowd surge, during a concert by the rapper Travis Scott, \u201ccaused some panic, and it started causing some injuries,\u201d said the fire chief, Samuel Pe\u00f1a. The concert was part of the Astroworld music festival.", "Twenty-two people were taken to nearby hospitals by emergency responders, Chief Pe\u00f1a said, adding that of those patients, 11 were in cardiac arrest. Over 300 people were treated at a \u201cfield hospital\u201d at the site, he said.", "The exact causes of death will be determined by the medical examiner, who is investigating the episode, Chief Pe\u00f1a said.", "\u201cOur hearts are broken,\u201d Judge Lina Hidalgo of Harris County said at the news conference. \u201cPeople go to these events looking for a good time,\u201d she said, adding, \u201cIt\u2019s not the kind of event you where you expect to find out about fatalities.\u201d"]
